attributes.action: Put the UK into a FULL lockdown
attributes.additional_details: Numbers of COVID are worse now than the first wave. Roads are busier as if nothing is wrong. The NHS is on its knees! Shut the whole country down again, roll the vaccination programme out and let’s get back to normal. Your country will Thank you in the end for this rather than will lockdowns here and there and tier systems that don’t work
attributes.background: In March 2020 the UK went into a full lockdown. If you couldn’t work from home you didn’t go to work. You need to do this again.

rejection.details:
In the first lockdown people were allowed to travel for work purposes, where they could not work from home: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/full-guidance-on-staying-at-home-and-away-from-others/full-guidance-on-staying-at-home-and-away-from-others#going-to-work

If you would like the Government to impose additional restrictions, you may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Enforce an extreme two-week lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553156

Implement full 6-week lockdown including closure of shops and businesses: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553580

Close all non-essential businesses: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566706
